channel.title: Need help with many things
channel.description: most weapons hit extremly to high on people in the wild and not enough on npcs, ags spec maxes like 40 on a npc and like 75 on a person in the wild, how do i fix what the weapons hit on both npc and on people. its not in the items.java, i can reset everything to 1 and still hit the same.

item.title: Need help with many things
item.dc:creator: @demonlover14 demonlover14
item.description:
@demonlover14 wrote:

Bulletthrust:

most weapons hit extremly to high on people in the wild and not enough on npcs, ags spec maxes like 40 on a npc and like 75 on a person in the wild, how do i fix what the weapons hit on both npc and on people. its not in the items.java, i can reset everything to 1 and still hit the same.

This is delt with the speical, this would be located with slip between client.java and player.java.

Read full topic
